title: Can't login to client
body: I have this problem where I can't login to the new client, it says my username is invalid. But when I use the old client (legacy client) it allows me to log in with the exact same username and password. What can I do to fix this?

replies.body:
Are you certain you're selecting the right language/region in the dropdown menu under the username and password fields? You may have the wrong region selected, causing the client to look for the wrong account.

Let me know if this fixed it!
